pkgmetadata.longdescription: More Statistical Methods for Composite Material Data // A companion package to 'cmstatr' https://cran.r-project.org/package=cmstatr. 'cmstatr' contains statistical methods that are published in the Composite Materials Handbook, Volume 1 (2012, ISBN: 978-0-7680-7811-4), while 'cmstatrExt' contains statistical methods that are not included in that handbook.
